CustomField.description: URL to visit 'URL' is selected as the Target Object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify URL to navigate to. You are able to add Quote, Account, and Opportunity fields available in Quote Line Editor (API Names). Examples: http://www.steelbrick.com, http://www.yoursite.com/{!Id}, or /{!Account.Name}/ {!SBQQ__YourCustomVar__c}
CustomField.label: URL
